price: Maze Musa anaga inkoni ye (ihinduka inzoka nini), itangira kumiragura ibyo (abarozi) bari bamaze guhimba.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā mūsā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā yafikūna
